content.prompt: Which of the following best reflects a continuity with the sentiments described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Arguments for greater philanthropy among wealthy industrialists during the Progressive Era
Advocacy for policies of international isolationism following the First World War
Requests for support of the development of new communication technologies during the 1920s
Demands for increased government accountability during the New Deal

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
